articles.title: Assassin’s Creed Mirage feels like a throwback (and digression) to 2007 - Polygon
articles.description: Ubisoft Bordeaux’s new Assassin’s Creed game features detective work and in-depth assassination missions, but also frustrating controls and technical hitches.
articles.content: Considering the massive worlds, endless side activities, and propulsive numbers go up progression systems of recent Assassins Creed games, it can be easy to forget that the series began as a detectiv… [+5802 chars]

articles.title: Robots are trained to help revive coral reefs - BBC
articles.description: Researchers are experimenting with robots to help speed up the restoration of coral reefs.
articles.content:
"It's a really special part of the world," says marine biologist Taryn Foster from the Abrolhos Islands, 40 miles from the coast of Western Australia.
